channel.title: KLTV 7 East Texas News Podcast
channel.itunes:author: KLTV 7 News
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcasts on kltv.com
channel.itunes:summary: Listen to the top headlines of KLTV 7 News at 10pm each night. KLTV is an ABC affiliate serving East Texas, including the Tyler, Longview, and Jacksonville area.
